RETURN, REFUND AND CANCELLATION POLICY


At Avionwear, we work at creating products that are not just beautiful to look at, but also functional and of the highest possible quality.


We hope not to ever disappoint you, but if for some reason you are not happy with the item you purchased, reach out to us on info@ladderminds.com within 48 hours of receipt and we will offer a full refund or exchange. Please note : This does NOT apply to products with custom initials emboss. You will have to ship the product back to us at your expense, and refunds will be processed within 15 working days after we receive it. Please note that we do not provide reverse pickups. 


We provide exchanges if the item you received was faulty, defective, or different from what you have ordered. Please check the product as soon as you receive it, and mail us on info@ladderminds.com or call +91 94456 80500 between Monday to Friday, 10 AM to 6 PM in case of any issues.


If you happen to make a wrong purchase, please notify us immediately so we can make the changes and avoid any unnecessary shipping. Our product pages have all the details we think you may need to make an informed purchase, and you can always reach out to us on info@ladderminds.com if you’d like to know more, before making your purchase.
